para.verbatim: Draw the horizontal slider and its components.
Handle the horizontal slider events.
Update the horizontal slider and its components.
Refresh the horizontal slider and its components.
Return whether the user's mouse cursor is hovering over the horizontal slider's button or not.
Return whether the user's mouse cursor is hovering over the horizontal slider or not.
Center the horizontal slider horizontally relative to the specified parent, then return the horizontal slider itself.
Center the horizontal slider vertically relative to the specified parent, then return the horizontal slider itself.

memberdef.name: center

para.verbatim: Center the horizontal slider on both axes relative to the specified parent, then return the horizontal slider itself.

memberdef.name: center_with_offset

para.verbatim: Center the horizontal slider with center() and offset it by x and y relative to the specified parent, then return the horizontal slider itself.
Return the width of the horizontal slider.
Return the height of the horizontal slider.
Return the width of the horizontal slider's bar.
